channel.title: Only crazy people run in the Houston heat on Andy Dyer
channel.description: Recent content in Only crazy people run in the Houston heat on Andy Dyer

item.title: My Epic 17 Mile Run & Other Moderately Fascinating Stuff
item.description: I haven't blogged for about three weeks! While I have the occasional reader, I don't think anyone's had to deal with a huge hole in their lives as a result of my absence. I could blame it on the heat or the fact that we're now more than halfway through the year and I've taken a total of one day of vacation so far. But I guess I don't have any real reason other than I just didn't feel like it.
